flavorText: When you've got nothing, you might as well trade it for something else.
name: Gamble
originalText: Search your library for a card, put that card into your hand, discard a card at random, then shuffle your library.

rulings.text: You put the card into your hand and discard a card at random all while Gamble is resolving. Nothing can happen between the two, and no player may choose to take actions.
You might end up discarding the card you searched for. Casting this spell is a gamble.

text: Search your library for a card, put that card into your hand, discard a card at random, then shuffle.
